problem.markdown: Which of the following is NOT a reason why PRT is a mandatory training requirement? ( ) Considered by senior leaders to be essential to individual, unit, and force readiness. ( ) Required by law for all individuals and units. (x) Considered by VA doctors to be essential in reducing PTSD.
problem.p: Which of the following is NOT a reason why PRT is a mandatory training requirement?

choicegroup.choice: Considered by senior leaders to be essential to individual, unit, and force readiness.
Required by law for all individuals and units.
Considered by VA doctors to be essential in reducing PTSD.
